Calc (spreadsheet)
Calc (foglio elettronico)
Calc can also export spreadsheets in several formats, including for example Comma Separated Value (CSV), Adobe PDF and HTML formats.
Calc è anche in grado di esportare i fogli elettronici in diversi formati, tra i quali ad esempio: Comma Separated Value (CSV), Adobe PDF e HTML.
Calc generates 2D and 3D charts, which can be integrated into other LibreOffice documents.
Con Calc è possibile generare grafici bi e tridimensionali che possono essere integrati in altri documenti di LibreOffice.
Calc has all of the advanced analysis, charting, and decision making features expected from a high-end spreadsheet.
Calc dispone di tutte le funzionalità avanzate per l'analisi, la creazione di diagrammi e di supporto a scelte decisionali che ci si attende da un programma di calcolo di alto livello.

Illustrazioni
Impress (presentations)
Impress (presentazioni)
Impress Remote is a mobile application developed by the community for Android and iOS systems that allows you to control a live presentation with a mobile device such as a phone or tablet.
Impress Remote is a mobile application developed by the community for Android and iOS systems that allows you to control a live presentation with a mobile device such as a phone or tablet.
Impress will create a presentation with as many pages as determined by the Slide layout number of slides per page.
Impress will create a presentation with as many pages as determined by the Slide layout number of slides per page.
Impress will memorize the timings for each slide and will advance to the next slide automatically using these timings when you run the slide show.
Impress will memorize the timings for each slide and will advance to the next slide automatically using these timings when you run the slide show.
In many situations, you may find that you have more slides than the time available to present them or you may want to provide a rapid overview without dwelling on the details.
In many situations, you may find that you have more slides than the time available to present them or you may want to provide a rapid overview without dwelling on the details.
Introducing LibreOffice
Introduzione a LibreOffice
Introduction
Introduction
It also connects to your email client.
Permette inoltre di collegarsi al vostro client di posta elettronica.
It includes over 300 functions for financial, statistical, and mathematical operations, among others.
Dispone, tra l'altro, di oltre 300 funzioni per calcoli finanziari, statistici e matematici.
Its native file format is Open Document Format (ODF), an open standard format that is being adopted by governments worldwide as a required file format for publishing and accepting documents.

Il suo formato file nativo è OpenDocument (ODF), un formato standard aperto che è in corso di adozione da parte di autorità governative di tutto il mondo come formato di file richiesto per la pubblicazione e accettazione dei documenti.
Jean Hollis Weber
Jean Hollis Weber
LibreOffice Impress has a Presenter Console function that can be used when an extra display for presentation has been connected to your computer.
LibreOffice Impress has a Presenter Console function that can be used when an extra display for presentation has been connected to your computer.
LibreOffice can also open and save documents in many other formats, including those used by several versions of Microsoft Office.
LibreOffice è anche in grado di aprire e salvare documenti in molti altri formati, compresi quelli utilizzati da varie versioni di Microsoft Office.
LibreOffice includes the following components.
LibreOffice comprende i seguenti componenti.
LibreOffice is a freely available, fully-featured office productivity suite.
LibreOffice è una suite gratuita di produttività per ufficio, completa di tutte le funzioni.
LibreOffice runs on Windows, Linux, and Mac OS X operating systems, each of which has several versions and can be customized by users (fonts, colors, themes, window managers).

LibreOffice funziona su sistemi operativi Windows, Linux, e Mac OS X, ciascuno dei quali ha diverse versioni e può essere personalizzato dagli utenti (tipo di carattere, colori, temi, gestori di finestre).

The Gallery (Figure <t0>309</t0>) provides a convenient way to group reusable objects such as graphics and sounds that you can insert into your documents.

Writer (word processor)
Writer (elaborazione di testi)
Writer can export files to HTML, XHTML, XML, Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF), and several versions of Microsoft Word files.
Con Writer è possibile esportare file nei formati HTML, XHTML, XML, Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) e Microsoft Word di diverse versioni.
Writer is a feature-rich tool for creating letters, books, reports, newsletters, brochures, and other documents.
Writer è uno strumento ricco di funzioni per la creazione di lettere, libri, relazioni, bollettini, depliant e altri documenti.
You can also open and work with Microsoft Excel workbooks and save them in Excel format.
È anche possibile aprire e lavorare con fogli di calcolo di Microsoft Excel e salvarli nell'originario formato Excel.
You can also pay for support through service contracts from a vendor or consulting firm specializing in LibreOffice.
You can also pay for support through service contracts from a vendor or consulting firm specializing in LibreOffice.
You can configure the slide transition from the Slide Transition section in the Tasks Pane.
You can configure the slide transition from the Slide Transition section in the Tasks Pane.
You can have as many slide shows as you want from a single presentation.
You can have as many slide shows as you want from a single presentation.
You can insert graphics and objects from other components into Writer documents.
Nei documenti di Writer è possibile inserire grafici e oggetti provenienti da altri componenti.
You can set the presentation <i0/>to advance automatically to the next slide after a set amount of time from the Slide Transition section in the Sidebar.
You can set the presentation <i0/>to advance automatically to the next slide after a set amount of time from the Slide Transition section in the Sidebar.
